name: tm89
effect: Teaches U-Turn to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches U-turn to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
flavor_text.platinum: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
